title: Super Premier League
description:
The FC crew continue to react to the summer transfer window and question how PL clubs were able to spend so much cash without being punished by financial fair play. Plus, the guys preview undefeated Arsenal's visit to Manchester United and react to Diego Simeone admitting he is following club orders when it comes to Antoine Griezmann's minutes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: PL outspends Top 5 Leagues by a massive margin; Steve Nicol on Arthur joining Liverpool; Simeone admits to club orders on Griezmann
